mapper.select: SELECT post_no, member_id, post_content, movieNm,image, post_date FROM filmbox_post

SELECT DISTINCT(movieNm), image FROM filmbox_member fm INNER JOIN filmbox_rev fr ON fm.member_id = fr.member_id INNER JOIN filmbox_movie fv ON fr.movieCd= fv.movieCd WHERE fm.member_id =#{member_id} AND fr.rev_condition=1 ;
mapper.insert: insert into filmbox_post ( member_id , post_content , movieNm , image , post_date) values(#{member_id}, #{post_content}, #{movieNm}, #{image}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS post_no, post.* FROM (SELECT fm.movieNm, COUNT(fm.movieNm) AS post_count,fm.image AS image, fm.movieCd FROM filmbox_post fp INNER JOIN filmbox_movie fm ON fp.movieNm = fm.movieNm GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 5) post WHERE (@rownum:=0)=0
mapper.insert: insert into filmbox_postsub (post_no, subcontent, member_id, sub_date) values (#{post_no}, #{subcontent}, #{member_id}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM filmbox_postsub WHERE post_no = #{post_no}

SELECT s.* FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS rnum, post.* FROM (SELECT subno,post_no, subcontent,member_id,sub_date FROM filmbox_postsub WHERE post_no=#{post_no}) post WHERE (@rownum:=0)=0 ) s WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startrow} AND #{endrow}
